{{Wired embedded system |brand=NetComm |model=NB6 |revision=rev 1 |asin= |est_release_date=06/2009 |fcc_date= |availability=now |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA1320 |type=dsl modem |fcc_id= |pcb_id=15-000471 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6338;BCM6338KFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J201,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J302,, |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301KSG;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_os=Linux;2.6.8.1; |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:60:64 |oui_eth=00:60:64 }} {{TagLine|ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :Models: NB6, NB6W, NB6Plus4, NB6Plus4W, NB6Plus4Wn
"3015-003741" and "0924"" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|D-Link DSL-2500U A1|Askey}}
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netcomm/nb6 ''NetComm NB6'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6338 @240MHz ([[BMIPS3300]]) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX29LV160DBTI-70G (2MB NAND) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM638165TS-6G (8MB SDRAM)
